Shivah:

Shivah frowned and said "My loyalty says that I must try to rescue 
him, and I have two powerful reasons to do it and I have a way to do 
it; if but incase that I can't rescue him I'll avenge him altough I 
die... But Good sensce said that If I don't work now he will die" and 
opened his com link to Blaze said "Blazem, I need you in conference 
room... follow my signal.  "

And looking to Killfest and the others, the young male said with 
determined tone "Are you with me? Can I count with your help?"
